string.text: Traditional bandit's outfit - leathern jacket with stitched in kevlar particles. Slightly increases bullet-proof and splinter-proof protection. Doesn't protect from \nanomalous influence.
Bandit's outfit.

Manufactured by one of the defense Kiev Research Institute on the order of "Duty" faction. The simpleness and reliability of basic PS3-9 model in combination \nwith new materials represents good protection from bullet and splinter hits, as well as against week anomalies. Over the lack of respiration protection system \nthe radiation defense level is low
PS3-9d suit

Manufactured by one of the defense Kiev Research Institute on the order of "Duty" faction. It's composed of: suit PS3-9d, 
respitation system with closed 
cycle, embedded system of suppressing anomaly fields effect. Provides a good defense from bullet and splinter hits. The 
level of protection from anomalous 
activity is average. Level of radiation defense is high.
Suit PS3-9Md

Manufactured for the work within the conditions of Zone, the suit of chemical protection SSP-99. Used by the expeditions of scientists and collaborating with \nthem stalkers-ecologists. Has implemented filtration and conditioning system. termperature-resistant. Badly conducts electricity. Very good protection from \nradiation and biological anomaloes. Resistant to chemically active environments. Is not suited for warfare, thus lacks defense against bullet or splinter damage.
Suit SSP-99

It's an experimental model of military exoskeleton. It wasn't in repetition work due to extreme high price and some 
mistakes in designing. In spite of this it had been produced in limited lots by underground organization outside of Ukraine. 
This kind of exoskeleton considered to belong to the third generation. All constructional defects, which greately 
decreased agility, had been eliminated. The armour also had been reinforced. Provides a good protection of bullet and 
splinter hits. The anomaly activity resistance level estimated as low.
Exoskeleton

Staker's coverall. "Mercenaries" formation. The samples of S.W.A.T. equipment had been taken as the basis. Due to \nspecial cloth processing, heat-proof and anti-rad properties had been reinforced. Surpasses army flak jacket PZS-7 series \na little bit in defence properties.
Mecenary's coverall

Army armoured suit SKAT-9M is created for leading storm operations in high anomalous activity zones. It contains: heavy 
army armoured suit PSZ-12p, integrated compensation suit, Sphere-12M helmet. Provides an exellent protection against 
bullet 
and splinter hits. Do not decreases agility. It has balanced proof system against anomalous effect.
Army armoured suit SKAT-9M

Stalker's coverall from "Monolith" formation. Manufacturer is unlknown. It loses to army flak jacket PSZ-9a series in technical 
characteristics. Stucturally it looks similar to widespreaded among neutral Stalkers suit where a flak jacket is combined 
with anti-rad suit. It protects against week shooting weapons. The level of anomalous activity defense is low due to lack 
of air filtration system.
Monolith coverall.

Modified coverall SSP-99. Bullet and splinter injuries proof in trunk part is added. It is used as guard equipment for \nscientific ecpedition. Heat-proof. Conduct electricity very bad. It is good protection against radiation and biological \nanomaly. Persistant to agressive chemical medium.
Coverall SSP-99M

This coveral is manufactured by defense SRI in Kiev, and is a good alternative to other stalker's coverall, prodused in 
underground condition. It is a good combination of armoured coverall, breathing system with closed cycle and integrated 
system of anomalous fields supression. Due to sucsesfully picked materials this suit is the best in his class. It has medium 
proof against bullets and splinter injuries. The level of anomalous activity proof has been estimated as medium. The only 
disadvantage is the price.
"SEVA" coverall

The army flak jacket series PZS-7 (Personal Protection System) pvovides a sufficient level of protection for leading war \noperation against easy equipted opponent. There is no aomalous activity proof.
Army flak jacket PZS-7

Modified equipment of S.W.A.T. Beryll-5M assigned for Zone conditions. It contains army flak jacket series PZS-9a \ncovered with berylium and helmet Sphere-08. Assigned for storm operations in high radioactive areas. The level of \nanomalous effect proof is low.
Army flak jacket Beryll-5M

The coverall made by "folk skilled craftsmen" is an effective combination of lightweight flak jacket made of gummed cloth. \nIt is reinforsed by integrated kevlar plates. It isn't bad in bullet protection. It can also protect from week anomalous activity \nand radiation.
\nStalker's coverall

Made by craftsmen of "Freedom" formation reinforsed Stalker's coverall. It contains medium army flak jacket, reinforcing 
zirconium elements providing good protection against machine-gun bullets and splinters on medium and far distanses. The 
stuff of the suit is of two layers: special processed leather and cloth with asbestos thread. It is a good proof against 
radiation and week anomalies.
"Freedom's guard" coverall

Made by craftsmen of "Freedom" formation light-weighted stalker's coverall. It contains leightweighted army flak jacket \nand reinforcing kevlar elements. It can protect from leight shooting weapon. The cloth is impregnated with special \nmixture, increasing resistance to anomalous activity.
"Wind of Freedom" coverall
